meanings.definition: The act of removing an established institution or practice
meanings.sent1: The disestablishment of the old rule brought about positive changes in the community.
meanings.sent2: The disestablishment of the monarchy led to a new era of governance.
meanings.sent3: The disestablishment of the outdated tradition was met with cheers and celebrations.
meanings.sent4: Her disestablishment of the strict regulations was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The disestablishment of the unjust law was long overdue.

meanings.definition: The process of ending the official status or support of a state church
meanings.sent1: The disestablishment of the state church was a significant event in history.
meanings.sent2: The disestablishment of the church led to a separation of religion and government.
meanings.sent3: The disestablishment of the church caused quite a stir among the clergy.
meanings.sent4: The disestablishment of the church symbolized a shift towards secularism.
meanings.sent5: The disestablishment of the church marked a turning point in religious freedom.
